page.title: 14My Flat
page.content: I live in a flat over looking the Saltings. Through our telescope you can just see Mersea. When I look though it I see boats bobing around in the water in between Tollesbury and Mersea. In front of me there are the old sail lofts, my dad uses 2 parts of 2 of the sail lofts. I can see boats on my right where the salt pool is. On my left I can see the sailing club and just before the sail lofts there is grass, which we play on. Between our flats and the salt pool is the sea_wall, which prevents us from flooding at high tide. The tide comes right under the sail lofts.
